The program can be compiled by running:

javac des.java

The program can be run from the same directory with:

java des [args]

For example, here is the example input:

java des 0001110011110001000011010001111111011001001111010001100111001110   0001111111011001001111010001110011110001111100010011110100001101  00100111111001111110001110000011 110000111000001111111101111111110000000011100110  100101010101010110101010111111000001111011100101  010001111110101000001110111010100010101011000000  00100011100010100000111101000111   0001110011110001111100011110011111100011111100010000110110001010  001000110001111111100101111111110000000000010101   1110101000001110111010100001010110101001110111111101010100000111
